name: Deploy
on:
  push:
    branches: [ "dev_test","master_test" ]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    env:
      DOCKERFILE_PATH: Dockerfile
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@master

    - name: Set env vars (dev)
      if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/dev_test'
      run: |
        echo "DOCKERFILE_PATH=Dockerfile" >> $GITHUB_ENV
        echo "LATEST_IMAGE=DOCKER_REGISTRY_TEST:latest" >> $GITHUB_ENV
        echo "COMMIT_IMAGE=DOCKER_REGISTRY_TEST:${{ github.sha }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV
    - name: Set env vars (prod)
      if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/master_test'
      run: |
        echo "DOCKERFILE_PATH=Dockerfile" >> $GITHUB_ENV
        echo "LATEST_IMAGE=DOCKER_REGISTRY_PROD:latest" >> $GITHUB_ENV
        echo "COMMIT_IMAGE=DOCKER_REGISTRY_PROD:${{ github.sha }}"  >> $GITHUB_ENV
    - name: Login to GitHub Container Registry (dev)
      if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/dev_test'
      uses: docker/login-action@v2
      with:
        registry: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_REGISTRY_TEST }}
        username: ${{ secrets.REGISTRY_USERNAME }}
        password: ${{ secrets.REGISTRY_PASSWORD }}

    - name: Login to GitHub Container Registry (prod)
      if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/master_test'
      uses: docker/login-action@v2
      with:
        registry: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_REGISTRY_PROD }}
        username: ${{ secrets.REGISTRY_USERNAME }}
        password: ${{ secrets.REGISTRY_PASSWORD }}


    - name: Pull latest image
      run: |
        docker pull ${{ secrets[env.LATEST_IMAGE] }} --ignore-pull-failures || true
    - name: Build image
      working-directory: .
      run: |
        docker build -f ${{ env.DOCKERFILE_PATH }} --cache-from ${{ secrets[env.LATEST_IMAGE] }} -t ${{ secrets[env.COMMIT_IMAGE] }} .
    - name: Tag latest image
      run: |
        docker tag ${{ secrets[env.COMMIT_IMAGE] }} ${{ secrets[env.LATEST_IMAGE] }}
    - name: Push images
      run: |
        docker push ${{ secrets[env.COMMIT_IMAGE] }}
        docker push ${{ secrets[env.LATEST_IMAGE] }}

    - name: Trigger deploy in portainer (dev)
      if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/dev_test'
      run: |
        curl -X POST ${{ secrets.PORTAINER_WEBHOOK_URL_TEST }}
      
    - name: Trigger deploy in portainer (prod)
      if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main_test'
      run: |
        curl -X POST ${{ secrets.PORTAINER_WEBHOOK_URL_PROD }}
